sentences.en: A copy of the report is available for you to peruse at your leisure.
sentences.cn: 现有一份报告，供你闲暇时细读。

sentences.en: a paradigm for students to copy
Always keep a copy of everything in your own files.
sentences.cn: 要时刻牢记把所有文件都备份。

sentences.en: Could you copy this letter and send it out, please?
sentences.cn: 你能把这封信复印一份发出去吗？

sentences.en: For a copy of their brochure, write to the above address.
sentences.cn: 欲索取其宣传册，请写信至以上地址。

sentences.en: I autographed a copy of one of my books.
sentences.cn: 我在自己的一本书上签了名。

sentences.en: I bought a copy of "USA Today" from a street-corner machine.
sentences.cn: 我从售货机上买了一份《今日美国》。

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentences.en: I sent a copy to the minister for transport.
sentences.cn: 我给交通部长发送了一份副本。

sentences.en: I will send you a copy of the report.
sentences.cn: 我会把这个报告的复印本寄给你。

sentences.en: Please copy down all the words on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 请把黑板上的字都抄下来.

sentences.en: Send them a copy of your CV.
sentences.cn: 给他们寄一份你的简历。

sentences.en: She is a carbon copy of her sister.
sentences.cn: 她跟她姐姐长得一模一样。

sentences.en: The difficulty is to get enough good copy to fill the magazine.
sentences.cn: 困难的是如何为该杂志组到足够多的好材料.

sentences.en: The new copiers only copy onto one side of the paper.
sentences.cn: 新复印机只能单面复印。

sentences.en: The second-hand version is a poor copy of the original.
sentences.cn: 盗版版本是对原版的低劣复制。

sentences.en: The teacher asked the students to copy out the text.
sentences.cn: 老师让同学们抄写课文.

sentences.en: To copy a file, press F3.

phrases.tran_cn: (出版社赠送给作者、读者、书评家等的)赠送本
档案复制，拷贝文件；存档原件
原本；原版拷贝；原版磁带

trans.tran_cn: 复制品，一本，原稿，消息，作业本，新闻素材
trans.tran_en: something that is made to be exactly like another thing

trans.tran_cn: 复印，仿造，临摹，抄写，效仿，作弊
trans.tran_en: to deliberately make or produce something that is exactly like another thing
